communityvideo.title: 【Speed Painting】Pearl Abyss DOKEV fan art
communityvideo.des2: Shuha! Hello everyone! This is Shunia. This time, based on the video that only p/v was released in Pearl Abyss I've been working on "Fan Art"! It's not an open game yet, so you might be unfamiliar with it Please look pretty!

communityvideo.title: [COVER]Pearl Abyss New Game, DokeV ! ★DokeV OST★ Rockstar-Luena singing a cappella with GALACTIKA (Acapella vers.)
communityvideo.des2: Pearl Abyss' new game announced at Gamescom in 2021!!😳😳 If you watch the video, you will fall in love! Soup soup is filling up ahah~~!😅 When will it be released~~~ When it is released, it is just installed. Enjoy the OST sung by Tune Aid's a cappella with a fun game video! ~😉 See U~~~ soon!!! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
